CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT( ISNULL(Venue__c) ),
Venue__r.Name & BR() & Venue__r.Street_Address__c & BR() & Venue__r.Town__c & BR() & Venue__r.County__c & BR() & Venue__r.Postcode__c & BR() & BR(),
'Parent Home' & BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingStreet& BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingCity & BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingCountry & BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingPostalCode& BR() & BR() )
CustomField.label: Venue Address
